snippet: Former Attorney General Ramsey Clark has offered to represent Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, accused of killing 13 people in a shooting rampage at Fort Hood, at his coming trial.
abstract: Former Atty Gen Ramsey Clark offers to represent Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, accused of killing 13 people in a shooting rampage at Fort Hood, Tex, at his coming trial.
lead_paragraph: Former Attorney General Ramsey Clark has offered to represent Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, accused of killing 13 people in a shooting rampage at Fort Hood, at his coming trial.

headline.main: Texas: Ex-Attorney General May Aid Rampage Defendant
headline.print_headline: Texas: Ex-Attorney General May Aid Rampage Defendant
